channel.title: General Mopar Monthly Improvements
channel.description: This thread will be used to discuss any general improvements and/or suggestions that could be introduced to the Mopar Monthly.

item.title: General Mopar Monthly Improvements
item.dc:creator: @Flame3 John
item.description:
@Flame3 wrote:

Ambokile:

One thing which was suggested was a “Quotes of the month” section which could bring some nice humour into the Monthly. The forum members could nominate quotes that they found funny from the previous month and then we can either discuss them between the team to pick the (I think 3 would be a good number) desired amount of quotes, or we can create a poll and allow users to vote between the quotes.

We could try it out.

Read full topic
